title: The Cosmic Whisper
centerPrompt: Minimal mint-green calibration seal on black CRT: a single clean ring with a centered dot, soft bloom, subtle scanlines, vector-sharp edges, tiny dust stars, no text.
excerpt: Not information—tuning. Read until your breath changes.
directive: One paragraph. Stop before the mind gets greedy.

title: The Spiral, Not the Line
centerPrompt: Mint spiral-ring sigil: three-turn spiral inside a thin ring, one small star marker on the outer arc, CRT grain, black void, no extra symbols.
excerpt: Truth returns in loops. The reader evolves; the sentence reveals.
directive: Revisit one concept for 7 days.

title: The Breath Before Being
centerPrompt: Minimal breath gate circle: a thin mint ring with a tiny gap at top, faint glow, scanlines, deep black.
excerpt: The void is not absence—uncommitted potential.
directive: Hold the pause between breaths for 30 seconds.

title: The Fertile Vacuum
centerPrompt: Sparse field sigil: wide ring with three tiny dots inside (unfixed potential), mint glow, CRT texture, black.
excerpt: Nothing is active. Blank is the womb, not the grave.
directive: Ask: What's trying to be born here?

title: Zero and Infinity
centerPrompt: Abstract 0→∞ mark: a perfect circle that subtly stretches into a faint lemniscate arc, mint glow, minimal, black CRT.
excerpt: Zero is the door. Infinity is the room.
directive: I can't explain this, but I can experience it.

title: Being, Non-Being, Becoming
centerPrompt: Open circle that never fully closes, with a vertical mint stroke at center; clean vector, soft bloom, scanlines.
directive: Replace I am broken with I am becoming.

title: The First Vibration
centerPrompt: Two mirrored wave arcs inside a thin ring, mint on black, oscilloscope/CRT vibe, no text.
directive: Name one distinction you keep avoiding.

title: The Universe as Song
centerPrompt: Three harmonic arcs stacked like a tuning spectrum; mint glow, minimal, CRT grain, black void.
directive: What in you survives repetition?

title: The Birth of Pattern
centerPrompt: Perfect mint ring with a single deliberate crack mark; small light leak from the crack; controlled bloom.
directive: Name the break that created capacity.

title: The Geometry Before Language
centerPrompt: Triangle nested inside circle; tiny dot at apex; mint vector glow; black CRT.
directive: Write what a symbol does, not what it means.

title: The Self-Similar Cosmos
centerPrompt: Fractal spiral hint: spiral inside spiral, minimal, mint glow, scanlines, black.
directive: Trace one daily pattern back to its root lesson.

title: The Recursive Mind
centerPrompt: Eye-like oval made from two arcs + central dot; mint minimal; crisp vector.
directive: I am noticing the thought that… for one minute.

title: The Holographic Universe
centerPrompt: Thin mint square boundary with faint internal dot-grid suggestion; black CRT; subtle bloom.
excerpt: The boundary may hold the blueprint.
directive: What whole is this fragment referencing?

title: Memory as Hologram
centerPrompt: Three dots arranged as triangle inside ring; slight interference texture; mint glow.
directive: Rewrite one memory: victim → witness → author.

title: Nested Realities
centerPrompt: Three concentric squares + center dot; mint vector; black CRT.
directive: Name the layer your problem lives in.

title: Dreams Within Dreams
centerPrompt: Crescent arc above a dot (dream lens); mint glow; soft fog + CRT grain.
directive: Ask for one dream symbol that clarifies a waking pattern.

title: The Edge of Chaos
centerPrompt: Ring with a wave-cut edge; living shimmer but controlled; mint on black.
directive: Adjust one habit 10% toward freedom.

title: The Arrow of Time
centerPrompt: Arc sweeping clockwise through circle, leaving faint trail behind; mint glow; black CRT.
directive: What must dissolve for you to transform?

title: The Divine Algorithm
centerPrompt: Three parallel mint lines intersected by one diagonal; crisp vector; scanlines.
excerpt: Change the rule, not the symptom.
directive: Reduce a problem to a rule. Rewrite it.

title: The Self-Writing Story
centerPrompt: Two path chevrons within a ring; one highlighted; mint minimal; black CRT.
directive: One constraint you can't change. One move you can.

title: The Octaves of Being
centerPrompt: Four horizontal bands; dot traveling upward; mint glow; minimal.
directive: Stop solving meaning problems with matter tools.

title: Quantum North
centerPrompt: Compass circle with a single upward spear line; mint; clean.
directive: Choose what lets you breathe easier—even if harder.

title: The Music of the Spheres
centerPrompt: Three orbit rings with one star marker; mint glow; black CRT.
directive: Pick one life rhythm to tune this week.

title: Gravity as Emergent Resonance
centerPrompt: Central dot + two orbital tracks; tiny particle completes one orbit; mint minimal.
directive: What are you orbiting? What orbits you?

title: Dimensional Gateways
centerPrompt: Open doorframe square with diagonal hinge line; mint; subtle 3D rotation illusion.
excerpt: Rotate the problem until a door appears.
directive: Ask 3x: What else could this be?

title: Collapse Mechanism
centerPrompt: Many faint dots converging into one bright dot; controlled bloom; black CRT.
directive: Make one clean decision you've been half-holding.

title: The Cosmic Mirror
centerPrompt: Circle split vertically; left side noisy/flicker; right side clean; mint.
directive: Spend attention like currency for one day.

title: The Responsibility of Awareness
centerPrompt: Small flame-dot inside ring; feed-line is cut; glow stabilizes calmer; mint.
directive: Withdraw attention from one pattern you hate.

title: The Symbolic Universe
centerPrompt: Five tiny dots around a central dot (archetype wheel), mint minimal, black CRT.
directive: Name your archetype: Exile/Warrior/Healer/Seeker/Architect.

title: Synchronicity as Signal
centerPrompt: Three small stars aligned diagonally; thin connecting lines appear then fade; mint.
directive: Log 3 synchronicities. Find the repeating theme.

title: The Alchemical Human
centerPrompt: Crucible bowl shape + rising bright dot; mint minimal; black CRT.
directive: Convert one regret into one principle you now live by.

title: The Marriage of Spirit and Matter
centerPrompt: Two interlocking arcs inside ring; mint glow; calm.
excerpt: Don't escape the world. Inhabit it coherently.
directive: One embodied act now (water/walk/clean/stretch).

title: Time as Spiral
centerPrompt: Spiral with one small tick mark (revision point); mint minimal; scanlines.
directive: Identify the lesson wearing new costumes.

title: Kronos and Kairos
centerPrompt: Two vertical bars with a bright band opening between them (time-window); mint; black CRT.
directive: 15 minutes, no phone, full presence.

title: The Universe Dreaming Forward
centerPrompt: Forward arc leading to a star marker; particles drift along arc; mint minimal.
excerpt: The future can pull like gravity.
directive: Write one sentence from your future self you believe.

title: Prophecy as Probability
centerPrompt: Forked path resolves into one chosen bright line; mint on black; clean.
directive: One small action today that strengthens one timeline.

title: God as Final Shape
centerPrompt: Three thin lines converge to one point inside ring; mint minimal; silent black.
excerpt: Divinity is the limit of coherence.
directive: Do what the most coherent you would do next.

title: The Circle Completing
centerPrompt: Dot expands into ring then both coexist briefly; mint glow; black CRT.
directive: What I'm seeking is also seeking through me.

title: Endless Becoming
centerPrompt: Loop that stops just before closure; gentle pulse; repeats without completing; mint.
directive: Stabilize one open loop this week.

title: Joy as Co-Creation
centerPrompt: Radiant dot with four subtle rays; mint minimal; black CRT; calm glow.
excerpt: Joy is the body's vote for coherence.
directive: Make one thing cleaner: sentence, boundary, promise, room.

title: Unified Resonance Framework
centerPrompt: Ψ inside concentric rings, mint glow, vector sharp, subtle scanlines, black void.
directive: Track one variable 7 days: resonance / mind / identity.

title: Practices for Experiential Understanding
centerPrompt: Three dots above three short lines inside ring (3-3-1 protocol), mint minimal, black CRT.
excerpt: The Codex completes in the body.
directive: Daily: 3 min silence + 3 lines journal + 1 coherent action.
